amendment.description: Amendment transfers $10 million within the Defense Health Program for various mental health programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 113-170 to increase by $10 million the Defense Human Resources Activity account for the purpose of enhancing Department of Defense efforts in mental health research, treatment, education, and outreach and reduce the Office of the Secretary of Defense account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Israel amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
